title: Riot, do the bot lane meta a favor, nerf the stupidly insane mobility adc's like Lucian.
body: Adc's like Lucian, and Corki (Even though he's not played as much at lower elo) who have insane mobility, high early burst and high early attackspeed need to be nerfed. I'm tired of trying to have a fun game, but literally every game I get into, not matter what position, the other team has a Lucian that just roflstomps my bot lane. It tends to not matter what supp he has when he can dance around the enemy team and chunk them. I think the best way to tone Lucian's kit down would be to nerf his passive. It's no fun fighting a Lucian whether you're laning against him or not.

replies.body: They already said they will be nerfing Lucian, and I wouldn't consider Corki, who has a single mobility spell that has a lengthy cooldown and is maxed last to have "insane mobility"
well when he has package the mobility is insane.
...Which has an 8 minute cooldown that isn't reduced by anything. And while he has it, he can't use his regular mobility spell.
Thats like saying malphite has insane mobility cause he has a mid range dash on a ~100 second (Sorry I don't know specifics) cooldown.

if malph could use his ult twice then maybe I could. I didn't mean his mobility was insane throughout the whole game, just the short duration when he has package. Also key word is "when" just like ahri has very good mobility when her ult is up.

plus it costs 100 mana..
unlike lucians e that costs 40 mana down to 0 at max rank

Mobility in general is just too plentiful.

You look at all the top tier champs, they all have a ton of mobility built in.  Nid, Ekko, Elise, Ez, Luc, Leblanc, Azir, graves. The list goes on.

TF and Shen used to dominate S2/3 because of the global ults.

Watch a team go in/out on baron/dragon now and you see 4/5 players dashing over the wall to safety once its finished.  The only role that doesnt routinely pick for mobility is support.

It's confusing because Riot used to consider Flash to be grossly OP and tried to discourage it from being the standard pick for all players.

Mobility was rare on champions and usually game with a price. Now its just everywhere and on everything.

> [{quoted}](name=Fovere,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=p4QR1PAk,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2016-05-15T15:49:07.722+0000)

> The only role that doesnt routinely pick for mobility is support.


and then you have braum...

His dash is conditional, and really only helps him get in position for his Unbreakable

Mostly he uses {{summoner:4}} for setting up ults, if you get caught b/c you were near a minion you're in a really stupid spot.

And you definitely don't pick {{champion:201}} for his _mobility_

This is why I sorta stopped playing Bard. I'd set an E up for everyone to escape but they'd all be on the other side already. Or I'd ult the enemy team but they'd see the indicator and all dash out of it.

> It's confusing because Riot used to consider Flash to be grossly OP and tried to discourage it from being the standard pick for all players.

And then powercreep happend.
All that's bigger, faster, stronger, flashier is tastier up to throwup (which we had about a year ago thus Rito changed main theme mobility -> invulnerability)

Remember -they almost removed flash from the game.
ADC's having dashes like his just seems to take away the point of a Adc.

Tired of high-mobility ad carries ruining your experience in botlane? Introducing Taliyah, the stoneweaver! 

Taliyah is the ~~mid lane mage~~ support for you! 
Unraveled earth (E) "Places a field of dash-sensitive traps that deal 80/105/130/155/180 (+.4 AP) magic damage and slow enemies in the area by 20% (+ ~4% per 100 AP). After 4 seconds, the traps explode, dealing damage again."

Pre-order now and get a free Poppy, keeper of the hammer for free! Poppy is the ~~Top laner/jungler~~ support to call when pesky Lucians ruin your fun! 
Steadfast presence (W) "Poppy gains bonus movement speed for 2.5 seconds and generates a barrier around her for the duration, causing all enemies who dash within to be Grounded icon knocked down and dealt magic damage."

Alternatively you can also order a Cassiopeia, the serpents embrace! The ~~poison mage~~ utility support who with the ability to stop dashes and flashes with ease!

Miasma (W) "Cassiopeia spits forth eight bolts of venom in an arc, leaving toxic clouds of Poison icon Debilitating Poison where they hit the ground for 5 seconds, and stopping upon impacting terrain.
Poison icon Debilitating Poison deals magic damage to enemies standing upon it every second, also Grounded icon grounding them and applying a Slow icon slow that decays over the area's duration."
I would agree with poppy if it didnt only stop 1 dash per champion
Wow, you didn't include {{champion:67}} . Downvoted.
Vayne is easier to counterplay than Lucian is on all levels. She has a pretty weak lane phase, where as riot's favorite gunner bullies and slaps his way through everyone.
No.Vayne doesn't have a weak laning phase,in addition Vayne's Kit cannot be countered,she has  as much as mobility as Lucian(without the ability to dash through walls) and moe raw firepower than him

she's not good anymore because of how fast games are decided. she can never farm and become a game changer late game. lucian and cait will poke you to death, something vayne can't do. Vayne was great when the game was more skill oriented instead of this jungle ganking and teleport  nonsense.

Raw moe power.

https://enimaanime.files.wordpress.com/2008/08/vlcsnap-2197221.png
Huzzah for Lucky Star jokes stemming from typing/spelling mistakes!

But then you get kog.... Let's be real here, I would choose corki or Lucian to be meta over kog anyday. I've had enough of watching kog mechanics go as far as just stand there (albeit at the right spot) and kill everything.
they can be meta but they should also be healthy not just for the person playing the champion. im pretty sure corki gets life steal on his full auto damage even though half of it is magic damage

And when Lucian falls out and Jinx comes back in, everyone will once again hate her to no end.

The cycle of salt shakers continues: They will complain...we will post

http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/le-miiverse-resource/images/a/a8/Duane_Salt.gif/revision/latest?cb=20150806212458
I'd be okay if jinx was a better pick tbh. That's because Jinx requires good play making and placement, without relying on countless dash after dash after dash.....

Good play making and placement for Jinx consists of hiding behind your teammates and never taking any risks because you out range everyone and can peel with your w and e, and get massive MS from your passive in any team fight. And can siege effortlessly without risk, unlike lucian.

She's even less healthy if you ask me.
Not to mention, her high range autos are AoE, can crit in that AoE, and scale with 110% AD (And they buffed them early game, because why not).

when riot stops making stupid unessicary buffs there will be considerably less complaining jinx ahs aoe critting rockes long range high dmage slowing W and traps rooting traps for E what was the reason in a time no one was complaining about her passive for her to get a buff to her passive that made it stack able

You want to do bot lane a favor?

Fucking nerf this new moronic caitlyn, lucian might be overpowered, but at least he's not a retarded piece of shit.
wat
Im guessing that idiot is mad that Cait can headshot you easier if you are dumb enough to step in her traps or be close enough for her to do her net auto combo on you.

"Must nerf thing, because other thing is broken, but don't nerf other thing." 
Wut?

> [{quoted}](name=LatetotheRace,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=p4QR1PAk,comment-id=00090002,timestamp=2016-05-15T21:47:08.361+0000)
>
> "Must nerf thing, because other thing is broken, but don't nerf other thing." 
> Wut?

As far as trying to have fun in bot lane is concerned, caitlyn is a bigger offender than lucian.

What exactly don't you understand?
Except.... Caitlyn is less irritating as she has substantially lower dps in the early to mid game.

> [{quoted}](name=LatetotheRace,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=p4QR1PAk,comment-id=0009000200000000,timestamp=2016-05-16T01:57:20.723+0000)
>
> Except.... Caitlyn is less irritating as she has substantially lower dps in the early to mid game.

She is also extremely inaccsesible to most things due to her massive range, spams traps to zone you under your own tower, and can chain a massive burst(trap->aa->e->q->aa) into cc from allied champions, so even if you do somehow manage to jump on that bs of a champion, she still has a good chance to burst you back, and now aside from being a ranged bully, also has burst to follow up cc with, or trade back in all ins, fun.
So don't step on her traps.

> [{quoted}](name=Darien Juranas,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=p4QR1PAk,comment-id=000900020000000000000000,timestamp=2016-05-16T16:36:38.066+0000)
>
> So don't step on her traps.

Do you understand what a cc chain is? or what zoning you under your own tower is?
You do understand that her traps don't get up and follow you, right? Or that without alternate hard CC, she has to have someone else stun/root/knockup you first?

Figures.

Damned silvers, I don't know what I expected.

Hyper-mobility in general needs to be toned down; tired of seeing zed, leesin, fizz, kindred, graves, ekko, yasou, kalista, ext. Seriously they've been outclassing 2/3 of the champion pool, just with their spam-able mobility that has negligible cost.
Once they nerf Lucian my main man Jhin is going to become FoTm. Lucian is the only thing keeping him down and not OP right now. Because hes most certainly is too strong.
Play {{champion:29}} . When {{champion:202}}  uses his ult: SURPRISE

after lucian they should consider to nerf jhin and not corki
jhin got counterplay yeye i know the 2.5 sec reload time but still i think his laning phase is way too dominant for how good his late game is
How to fight Jhin. Wait for him to reload while farming. Engage.

> [{quoted}](name=Light24o1,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=p4QR1PAk,comment-id=00060001,timestamp=2016-05-15T18:06:49.192+0000)
>
> How to fight Jhin. Wait for him to reload while farming. Engage.

People don't do this?
Apparently people don't understand what a 2 second downtime means.

when they walk out of range and you have to have your ally agree and his support not be vigialant for this to work also i can throw spells out in this game and jhin reloads before the spell is done fireing i dont think that reload time is completely static though ive never looked at the game clock to time it i dont think there is a skill shot in the game that takes 2.5 seconds to fire except tarics e

Adcs are played with having supports around support champions are nerfed so they arent opressive in lane or when alone but adcs aren't you can barely take a support into a solo lane but just about any adc can double as a mid or top. still adcs are supposedly weak early game which means they arent as shit stompingly strong as they are late game but they still even with or above everyone else early. Its mostly because of how much % movement speed options a high damage ranged class has compared to everyone else.
Lucian can kill you in a few hits at lvl one. Why he deals so much damage early on is beyond me.
Remove Corki's package and he's generally fun. Reworks are performed by monkeys.
